## DELETE ME PROMPT

Select between five and 30 locations within a city or metropolitan area. For each location, generate
isochrones for the same travel time for at least two different modes. Calculate the area of each isochrone
and compare the areas of the isochrones for the two (or more) modes you analyzed. Create three figures
(which may or may not be maps) to illustrate the results of your analysis.
